attributes.action: Stop no deal brexit!Brexit has been extended to find a solution to avoid no deal
attributes.background:
In case of no deal brexit many small and big businesses will not survive due to the high import duties and consumers will suffer an increase of costs.
 England is not ready for a no deal brexit and is not going to be in a near future. Brexit has been delayed to find a solution not to surrender

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/262986
